concept.title: June 15, 2017
concept.shortdesc: Release Notes for the June 15, 2017 release.

row.entry: Released a new API to retrieve App embed codes. More info can be found at http://api.livefyre.com/docs/apis/by-category/apps
Fixed a bug in Carousel to allow native Livefyre content (images uploaded directly to Studio) to appear in the app appropriately.
Enhanced Comments to meet font color guidelines dictated by ADA requirements.
Fixed a bug that caused Instagram Location Search results to show duplicates.
Fixed a bug to allow all uploaded media in tweets to be captured by the Media Required filter.
Fixed a slowdown issue in the ModQ Streams Premod tab when Instagram Carousel content was pulled in.
Enhanced Sidesnotes to support front-end moderation. This means moderators logged into the app on the front-end will be able to approve or delete content.
Fixed a bug that prevented map locations from saving when performing Twitter Social Searches.
Fixed a bug in Storify 2 that was causing the page to jump if a user sorted by "Oldest to Newest" or "Newest to Oldest."
Added the ability to filter Tweets by Language in Stream Rules.
Added the ability to filter on multiple map locations in Twitter and Instagram Stream rules.
Added validation improvements when saving Twitter Stream Rules.
Enhanced the contrast on toggle components across Studio for easier visibility.
When you clear filters in the library, you will remain in the same folder selection, instead of being redirected to another page.
